scripts.checkers:lib: npm run checkers:clean-lib && babel packages/checkers/src -d packages/checkers/lib
scripts.collections:lib: npm run collections:clean-lib && babel packages/collections/src -d packages/collections/lib
scripts.colors:lib: npm run colors:clean-lib && babel packages/colors/src -d packages/colors/lib
scripts.encoding:lib: npm run encoding:clean-lib && babel packages/encoding/src -d packages/encoding/lib
scripts.iter:lib: npm run iter:clean-lib && babel packages/iter/src -d packages/iter/lib
scripts.memoize:lib: npm run memoize:clean-lib && babel packages/memoize/src -d packages/memoize/lib
scripts.numbers:lib: npm run numbers:clean-lib && babel packages/numbers/src -d packages/numbers/lib
scripts.objects:lib: npm run objects:clean-lib && babel packages/objects/src -d packages/objects/lib
scripts.pretty-console:lib: npm run pretty-console:clean-lib && babel packages/pretty-console/src -d packages/pretty-console/lib
scripts.promises:lib: npm run promises:clean-lib && babel packages/promises/src -d packages/promises/lib
scripts.strings:lib: npm run strings:clean-lib && babel packages/strings/src -d packages/strings/lib
scripts.url:lib: npm run url:clean-lib && babel packages/url/src -d packages/url/lib
scripts.clean-lib: npm run checkers:clean-lib && npm run collections:clean-lib && npm run colors:clean-lib && npm run encoding:clean-lib && npm run iter:clean-lib && npm run memoize:clean-lib && npm run numbers:clean-lib && npm run objects:clean-lib && npm run pretty-console:clean-lib && npm run promises:clean-lib && npm run strings:clean-lib && npm run url:clean-lib
scripts.lib: npm run checkers:lib && npm run collections:lib && npm run colors:lib && npm run encoding:lib && npm run iter:lib && npm run memoize:lib && npm run numbers:lib && npm run objects:lib && npm run pretty-console:lib && npm run promises:lib && npm run strings:lib && npm run url:lib
scripts.clean-dist: npm run checkers:clean-dist && npm run collections:clean-dist && npm run colors:clean-dist && npm run encoding:clean-dist && npm run iter:clean-dist && npm run memoize:clean-dist && npm run numbers:clean-dist && npm run objects:clean-dist && npm run pretty-console:clean-dist && npm run promises:clean-dist && npm run strings:clean-dist && npm run url:clean-dist
scripts.clean: npm run clean-lib && npm run clean-dist
scripts.prepare: npm run lint && npm run lib && npm run dist
